## Sprint Opening

Welcome to the first sprint of the CLIP. Here we are going to focus con the Fundamentals and Principles for the Climate Labs.

> The main goal in this sprint is for each team to build their Climate Lab Manifesto

First, three conceptual videos are proposed to open the discussion on the three thematic pillars that constitute the Climate Lab project: Climate Change, Social Innovation and Innovation Labs.
